channel.title: CVE Feed for Hewlett Packard Enterprise -- XP Storage using HGLM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hewlett Packard Enterprise -- XP Storage using HGLM

item.title: CVE-2017-8985|2024-09-16T19:56:46.119Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- xp%20storage%20using%20hglm
item.description: HPE XP Storage using Hitachi Global Link Manager (HGLM) has a local authenticated information disclosure vulnerability in HGLM version HGLM 6.3.0-00 to 8.5.2-00.
